sen.j: 松本 謙三（まつもと けんぞう、1899年（明治32年）3月21日 - 1980年（昭和55年）9月15日）とは、ワキ方下掛宝生流能楽師。
sen.e: Kenzo MATSUMOTO (March 21, 1899 - September 15, 1980) was a Noh actor of the Shimogakari Hosho school of supporting actors (waki-kata).
Kenzo MATSUMOTO (March 21, 1899 - September 15, 1980) was a Noh actor of the Shimogakari Hosho school of waki-kata (supporting actors).
Kenzo MATSUMOTO (March 21, 1899 - September 15, 1980) was a Noh actor of the Shimogakari Hosho school of waki-kata (supporting actors).

sen.j: 重要無形文化財保持者（人間国宝）に認定。
sen.e: He was designated as the holder of Important Intangible Cultural Property (Living National Treasure).
He was designated as the holder of Important Intangible Cultural Property (Living National Treasure).
He was designated as the holder of Important Intangible Cultural Property (Living National Treasure).
